title: Sound On: NYC Schools Shutdown and Virus
itunes:title: Sound On: NYC Schools Shutdown and Virus
description:
Bloomberg Chief Washington Correspondent Kevin Cirilli delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

“Guests: Wendy Benjaminson, Politics Editor for Bloomberg News, Calvin Schnure, Senior Economist at Nareit, Erin McPike, Liberal Political and Media strategist, Scott Tranter, CEO of 0ptimus and former Data Science Director for Marco Rubio for President and Rep. Trey Hollingsworth US Congressman from Indiana's 9th District, republican.” To listen on the Bloomberg terminal, click on the player thumbnail on the sidebar.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
